snippet: Mr. Genoways drew national attention in 2010 when the Virginia Quarterly Review's managing editor committed suicide, with some staff members saying Mr. Genoways created workplace stresses. He denied any responsibility.
abstract: Mr. Genoways drew national attention in 2010 when the Virginia Quarterly Review's managing editor committed suicide, with some staff members saying Mr. Genoways created workplace stresses. He denied any responsibility.
